name: Ozera
description:
❝ Welcome to Ozera. ❞ ─────

"Here, all your needs are within reach."

Everything is just as it seems. 

Just keep farming.

There must be a way off this island.

Team. ─────

✚ Alex Rose - gameplay code

✄ Angela He - art + code

♪ Atmospherium - sound + code

Controls. ───── GamepadKeyboardA/Cross = Use tool/hold to throw pet
X/Square = Pick up/drop/swap tools
Y/Triangle = Pick up pet
B/Square = RunSpace = Use tool/hold to throw pet
X = Pick up/drop/swap tools
C = Pick up pet
Left shift = Run

Feedback is appreciated.

Lastly - please have a great stay at the island.
